Headline: Why Fox News intrigued 'Bombshell' director Jay Roach
Article_Body: Jay Roach joins Brian Stelter to discuss "Bombshell," his buzzy new film about the end of the Roger Ailes era at Fox News. "It's sort of astonishing that these women, who sometimes don't look at themselves as feminists... ended up being the ones to take down this major media titan," Roach says.
